insert_obs_data module¶

Insert observation data CLI

This script allows the user to insert observation data into Dataex server. It takes as input the json file containing the observations along with the country id number.

Usage:

$ get_obs_data.py --country_id <int> --obs_data <str>

Options:
country_idint

id number of country

obs_datastr

input filename either csv or excel

insert_obs_data.create_json(file, country_id)¶

Creates a json file

fileobject

dataframe

country_id: str

Id of country entered by the user

json

a json file containing rows of observation data

dataex-client
